title: How It Works – Fence Rentals Made Simple

steps.title: Step 1: Request a Free Quote
steps.description: Call or message us with your location, rental needs, and timeline—we’ll respond quickly with a tailored estimate.

steps.title: Step 2: Schedule Your Rental
steps.description: Set a delivery time that works for you. Our dispatch team will confirm everything and prep the equipment.

steps.title: Step 3: We Deliver & Set Up
steps.description: Our crew handles full setup, from placement to safety checks, ensuring your unit is secure and ready to use.

steps.title: Step 4: Pickup & Clean Removal
steps.description: When your rental ends, we return promptly to clean up and remove everything—no mess, no stress.
